attack-object.name: Trusted Relationship
attack-object.score-comment: This control may expose and detect malicious access of customer data and resources by compromised Google personnel accounts. The trusted relationship between Google personnel who administer and allow customers to host their workloads on the cloud may be abused by insider threats or compromise of Google.

attack-object.name: Data from Cloud Storage Object
attack-object.score-comment: This control may expose and detect malicious access of data from cloud storage by compromised Google personnel accounts.
